rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" bh_autotools_dev_update autoreconf -vfi
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --build="$BOLT_BUILD_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --enable-gettext=no
# why does this package insist on using gettext? echo " #define _(x) x #define bindtextdomain(x, y) #define textdomain(x) " >> include/config.h
rules.install: cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make install make install-dev make install-lib
